TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlRootAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 控制视为 XML 根元素的属性目标的 XML 序列化。

span.span: Controls XML serialization of the attribute target as an XML root element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性，这些属性控制 序列化或反序列化对象的方式。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 有关类似属性的完整列表，请参阅 [控制 XML 序列化的属性](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](/dotnet/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization). 您可以将应用于 类、结构、枚举或接口。You can apply the to a class, structure, enumeration, or interface. 还可以将属性应用于 XML Web service 方法的返回值。You can also apply the attribute to the return value of an XML Web service method. 每个 XML 文档都必须有一个包含所有其他元素的根元素。Every XML document must have a single root element that contains all the other elements. 允许您 通过设置某些属性来控制生成根元素的方式。The allows you to control how the generates the root element by setting certain properties. 例如，通过设置属性来指定生成的 XML 元素的名称 。For example, specify the name of the generated XML element by setting the property. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅 [特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). > [!NOTE] > 您可以 `XmlRoot` 在代码中使用该单词而不是更长的时间 。You can use the word `XmlRoot` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例将应用于 类。The following example applies the to a class. 特性指定元素名称、命名空间以及元素是否是限定的，以及在 `xsi:nil` 类设置为时是否生成特性 `null` 。The attribute specifies the element name, namespace, and whether the element is qualified, and whether the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated if the class is set to `null`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlRootAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlRootAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlRootAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlRootAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlRootAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlRootAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：指定 XML 流的替代元素名称

span.span: How to: Specify an Alternate Element Name for an XML Stream

related.span: 使用属性控制 XML 序列化

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并将类名用作 XML 根元素的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and uses the class name as the name of the XML root element.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个实例 ，并将其分配给 对象的属性 。The following example creates an instance of an and assigns it to the property of an object. 序列化对象时 `MyClass` ，它将使用 对象来重写默认根元素。When the serializes the `MyClass` object, it uses the object to override the default root element. summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定 XML 根元素的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name of the XML root element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建 XmlRootAttribute 的实例，并使用它来重写名为 "Student" 的类的实例的序列化。The following example creates an instance of the XmlRootAttribute and uses it to override the serialization of an instance of a class named "Student". [!code-cpp[XMLRootAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLRootAttribute_Constructor/CPP/xmlrootattribute_constructor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XMLRootAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLRootAttribute_Constructor/CS/xmlrootattribute_constructor.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XMLRootAttribute_Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLRootAttribute_Constructor/VB/xmlrootattribute_constructor.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 根元素的 XSD 数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the XSD data type of the XML root element.

value.span: XSD (XML 架构文档) 数据类型。

span.span: An XSD (XML Schema Document) data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了 XSD 简单数据类型及其 .NET 等效项。The following table lists the XSD simple data types with their .NET equivalents. 对于 XSD `base64Binary` 和 `hexBinary` 数据类型，请使用 结构数组，并 根据需要将属性设置为 "base64Binary" 或 "hexBinary" 的应用。For the XSD `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of structures, and apply a with the property set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate. 对于 XSD `time` 和 `date` 数据类型，请使用 类型，并将 设置为 "日期" 或 "时间"。For the XSD `time` and `date` data types, use the type and apply the with the set to "date" or "time". 对于映射到字符串的每个 XSD 类型，应用 其 属性设置为 XSD 类型的。For every XSD type that is mapped to a string, apply the with its property set to the XSD type. 但是，这不会更改序列化格式，而只会更改成员的架构。However, this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member. > [!NOTE] > 属性区分大小写，因此必须将其精确设置为 XSD 数据类型之一。The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XSD data types. > [!NOTE] > 将二进制数据作为 XML 元素传递比将其作为 XML 特性传递更为有效。Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient than passing it as an XML attribute. 有关 XML 数据类型的详细信息，请参阅名为 XML Schema 的万维网联合会文档 [第2部分：数据类型](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)。For more information about XML data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium document named [XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/). |XSD 数据类型XSD data type|.NET 数据类型.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURIanyURI|| |base64Binarybase64Binary|对象数组 Array of objects| |booleanboolean|| |字节byte|| |datedate|| |dateTimedateTime|| |Decimaldecimal|| |Doubledouble|| |ENTITYENTITY|| |条目ENTITIES|| |FLOATfloat|| |gDaygDay|| |gMonthgMonth|| |gMonthDaygMonthDay|| |gYeargYear|| |gYearMonthgYearMonth|| |hexBinaryhexBinary|对象数组 Array of objects| |IDID|| |IDREFIDREF|| |IDREFSIDREFS|| |intint|| |integerinteger|| |语言language|| |longlong|| |名称Name|| |NCNameNCName|| |negativeIntegernegativeInteger|| |NMTOKENNMTOKEN|| |NMTOKENSNMTOKENS|| |normalizedStringnormalizedString|| |nonNegativeIntegernonNegativeInteger|| |nonPositiveIntegernonPositiveInteger|| |NOTATIONNOTATION|| |positiveIntegerpositiveInteger|| |QNameQName|| |recurringDaterecurringDate|| |durationduration|| |stringstring|| |shortshort|| |timetime|| |令牌token|| |unsignedByteunsignedByte|| |unsignedIntunsignedInt|| |unsignedLongunsignedLong|| |unsignedShortunsignedShort||

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的 和 方法分别生成和识别的 XML 元素的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML element that is generated and recognized by the class's and methods, respectively.

value.span: 在 XML 文档实例中生成和识别的 XML 根元素的名称。

span.span: The name of the XML root element that is generated and recognized in an XML-document instance.

value.span: 默认值为序列化类的名称。

span.span: The default is the name of the serialized class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果希望生成的 XML 元素的名称与类名称不同，请指定。Specify an if you want the name of the generated XML element to differ from the class name. ## Examples 下面的示例创建类的一个实例 ，并将 属性设置为一个新值。The following example creates an instance of the class and sets the property to a new value. 然后，将使用对象来创建一个 对象，该对象用于重写对象的序列化。The object is then used to create an object used to override the serialization of an object. [!code-cpp[XMLRootAttribute_ElementName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLRootAttribute_ElementName/CPP/xmlrootattribute_elementname.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XMLRootAttribute_ElementName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLRootAttribute_ElementName/CS/xmlrootattribute_elementname.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XMLRootAttribute_ElementName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLRootAttribute_ElementName/VB/xmlrootattribute_elementname.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 是否必须将设置为 的成员序列化为设置为 的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the must serialize a member that is set to into the attribute set to .

value.span: 如果 生成 属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the generates the attribute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构的 XML 架构规范允许 XML 文档显式通知缺少某个元素的内容。The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing. 此类元素包含将特性 `xsi:nil` 设置为 `true` 。Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:nil` set to `true`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [XML 架构第1部分：结构第二版](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/)。For more information, see [XML Schema Part 1: Structures Second Edition](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/). 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则将 `xsi:nil` 生成特性，如下面的 XML 所示：If the property is set to `true`, the `xsi:nil` attribute is generated as shown in the following XML: ``` ``` 如果 属性为 `false` ，则将创建一个空元素，如下面的代码所示：If the property is `false`, an empty element is created as shown in the following code: ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Group` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 该示例将应用 到类，并将属性设置 为 `false` 。The example applies the to the class, and sets the property to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlRootAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlRootAttribute.IsNullable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlRootAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlRootAttribute.IsNullable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlRootAttribute.IsNullable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlRootAttribute.IsNullable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 根元素的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace for the XML root element.
The namespace for the XML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性符合[XML 中名为命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/)的万维网联合会规范。The property conforms to the World Wide Web Consortium specification named [Namespaces in XML](https://www.w3.org/TR/xml-names/). 若要在 XML 文档中创建前缀命名空间，请创建一个 包含所有前缀-命名空间对的对象。To create prefixed namespaces in the XML document, create an object that contains all the prefix-namespace pairs. 为每个设置的命名空间都 必须包含在 对象中。The namespace you set for each must be contained in the object. 生成文档时，它会为每个数组项的元素名称提供正确的前缀。When the generates the document, it correctly prefixes the element name for each array item. ## Examples 下面的示例将应用 到类并设置 属性。The following example applies the to a class and sets the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlRootAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlRootAttribute.Namespace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlRootAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlRootAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlRootAttribute.Namespace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlRootAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
